Admission Diagnosis:
Viral pharyngitis.

Discharge Diagnosis:
Viral pharyngitis.

Hospital Course:
Stable vitals. Symptoms improved with supportive care.
No complications noted.

Discharge Medications:
Acetaminophen as needed for pain/fever.

Follow-up:
Primary care follow-up in 3-5 days if not improving.

Discharge Instructions:
Hydration, rest, and return precautions discussed.
Seek care if breathing difficulty, chest pain, or worsening symptoms.
